ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: Where are you hunting at to make that type of money?  I ve wanted to get a horse for a while but have never had the money.  Plus I d like to twink out other
ygData.messageBody:
Where are you hunting at to make that type of money? I've wanted to get a horse for a while but have never had the money. Plus I'd like to twink out other characters while I was at it...but of course have never had the money.

>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>From: alexander.jones@...
>Date: Tue, 11 Mar 2003 12:59:45 +0100
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>
>On one good evening of exp you can make 100k. (if you are lucky). On one
>normal evening of exp you should make at least 500-1kpp if you choose that
>type of spot (4h or so of playing).
>
>You really think 5k is expensive?
>
>Hokay.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
>Sent: den 11 mars 2003 12:21
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
>
>
>
>> Ummm ok. Hint inc.....
>>
>> Have you ever noticed that you draw a lot more aggro sitting than
>> standing or are you always soloing instead of grouping?
>>
>I think she meant that she wanted to know the OTHER benefits beyond not
>having to sit while medding. :-) 5k for a horse is still outrageous....
>Unless that horse can carry stuff for me and keep me from being encumbered..
>Oh, and for the 10+ horses, they better perform sexual favors for merchants
>to get me better prices and faction for me to pay that kind of cash. luv,
>-Su
